article.simpara: Congratulations! You built a simple web application with Spring Boot and learned how it can ramp up your development pace. You also turned on some handy production services. This is only a small sampling of what Spring Boot can do.
See Spring Boot’s reference documentation for much more information about the Spring Boot framework.

section.title: See Also
section.simpara: The following courses offer a more extensive introduction to Spring Boot:

listitem.simpara: An in-depth introduction: Building a REST API with Spring Boot

section.simpara: The following guides may also be helpful:

simpara.ulink: Serving Web Content with Spring MVC

section.simpara: Want to write a new guide or contribute to an existing one? Check out our contribution guidelines.

important.simpara: All guides are released with an ASLv2 license for the code, and an Attribution, NoDerivatives creative commons license for the writing.
